positive_examples: This is an example of integer overflow attack.
The integer overflow attack demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed integer overflow attack in this context.
A typical case of integer overflow attack would involve these features.
The concept of integer overflow attack applies here.
An attack that exploits integer overflow conditions to cause unexpected behavior in memory allocation or indexing.
negative_examples: This is an example of buffer overflow attack, not integer overflow attack.
This represents memory corruption attack in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: BufferOverflowAttack, or other types of MemoryCorruptionAttack

definition: A security exploit that causes arithmetic operations to exceed integer bounds.
